QuestData.Title: The Champion's Call!
QuestData.Description: Pfft, what happens down here ain't fightin'. It's a couple of guys dancin' around a flag.$B$BYou lookin' for some real action, buddy? 'Cause if you are I got the hottest ticket in town.$B$BEver heard of Gurgthock and Wodin? Goblin and troll who ran the Ring of Blood back in Outland? Well they're here in Northrend and they've started up a whole new fight club over in Zul'Drak. If you're interested go to Zul'Drak, east of Crystalsong. They're at the big arena in the center. Tell 'em Shifty sent ya!
QuestData.LogDescription: Seek out Gurgthock at the Amphitheater of Anguish in Zul'Drak.
